pullrequest.title: Fix Issue #40: Add textinput to install requirements

content.raw: @MarcAsenjo if it's a small package it can ideally be replaced not be a dependency at all. There's a strong preference for not maintaining code that will never be used (which are the other parts of the dependency).
content.html: @MarcAsenjo if it's a small package it can ideally be replaced not be a dependency at all. There's a strong preference for not maintaining code that will never be used (which are the other parts of the dependency).
